class.name: InputEventJoypadButton
class.brief_description: Represents a gamepad button being pressed or released.
class.description: Input event type for gamepad buttons. For gamepad analog sticks and joysticks, see [InputEventJoypadMotion].

members.member: Button identifier. One of the [enum JoyButton] button constants.
If [code]true[/code], the button's state is pressed. If [code]false[/code], the button's state is released.

member.name: pressure
member.deprecated: This property is never set by the engine and is always [code]0[/code].
